ValidationRule.description: When the Provider Trainee Type is ‘Other’, the user must specify the Number of Years In Practice (pcpyrspract__c). This validation fires only if the current time is greater than or equal to Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c and the Bypass field is not blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(Incomplete_Submission__c), OR(Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c <= NOW(), ISBLANK(Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c)), ISPICKVAL(pcptraintype__c, 'Other medical trainee'), ISBLANK(pcpyrspract__c), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Provider' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: “Please specify the Number of Years In Practice when ‘Trainee Type’ is ‘Other medical trainee’.”
